metadata.Title: CVE-2020-11879 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in GNOME Evolution before 3.35.91. By using the proprietary (non-RFC6068) "mailto?attach=..." parameter, a website (or other source of mailto links) can make Evolution attach local files or directories to a composed email message without showing a warning to the user, as demonstrated by an attach=. value.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-11879` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

evolution - 3.46.0-2
evolution-common - 3.46.0-2
evolution-plugin-bogofilter - 3.46.0-2
evolution-plugin-pstimport - 3.46.0-2
evolution-plugin-spamassassin - 3.46.0-2
evolution-plugins - 3.46.0-2
evolution-plugins-experimental - 3.46.0-2
libevolution - 3.46.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: evolution package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.46.0-2').
